title: Life expectancy in Mexico 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: Overall Life expectancy at birth in years has increased over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Life expectancy at birth in years, of value 74.92 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Life expectancy at birth in years, of value 74.9 was reported at Year 2015
min_summary: In general Life expectancy at birth in years has stayed the same over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
